author: Dan Gallagher
title: Videogame Makers Clicking Subscribe
text:
One way videogame makers can keep players coming back for more is to make sure they never leave in the first place.
Subscription-based businesses are growing popular across more of the technology world and videogames are no exception. Electronic Arts and Nintendo both revealed plans this week for new subscription-based services. Nintendo’s, called Switch Online, goes live in September and will allow subscribers to play online against others, as well as access some of the company’s classic titles from the original NES system...
